description:
Even after his job was done he continued on his quest to "exorcise" the nearby spirits. Hearing of a doll spirit in the form of a young girl, he can`t contain himself and heads over right away!
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: The Dreaded "Phone Call from Mary-san"! A Hairlessly Smooth-Crotched and Flat-Chested Lolita Cock Sleeve Doll
恐怖『メリーさんの電話』! つるぺたロ○ータのオナホ人形
